quotes.quote: I am not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger. A guy opens his door and gets shot, and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!
quotes.speaker: Walter White

quotes.quote: I did it for me. I liked it. I was good at it. And I was really... I was alive.
quotes.speaker: Walter White

quotes.quote: I chose a half measure when I should have gone all the way.
quotes.speaker: Walter White

quotes.quote: I'm not in danger, Skyler. I am the danger. A guy opens his door and gets shot, and you think that of me? No. I am the one who knocks!
quotes.speaker: Walter White
